title: RBI DG asks NaBFID to develop self-sustainable business model, not dependent on government support
description: RBI Deputy Governor M Rajeshwar Rao urged NaBFID to create a self-sustainable business model without relying on government support. He emphasized the need for agile strategies and higher private sector involvement in infrastructure investments. Rao also highlighted the importance of risk management and project appraisal expertise for NaBFID's success.
